definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...

sentences.english: There are various ways to do 301 redirects.
sentences.chinese: 有各種不同的辦法做301重定向。

sentences.english: The other is that it easily suffers from the re-direction attack for the users.
sentences.chinese: 該協議對於移動用戶易遭受重定向攻擊。

sentences.english: You should be redirected to the login screen.
sentences.chinese: 您應當被重定向到登錄屏幕。

sentences.english: Retargetable compilation technologies are to meet this requirement.
sentences.chinese: 可重定向編譯技術正好能滿足這一需求。

sentences.english: You can also run it in the background while redirecting output to a file.
sentences.chinese: 也可以在後臺運行該命令，並將輸出重定向到文件。

sentences.english: If it has, an error message is created and you redirect to the index page.
sentences.chinese: 如果是，將創建一個錯誤消息並重定向到索引頁面。

sentences.english: He is then redirected to a shopping cart containing the game.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他被重定向到包含這個遊戲的購物車。

sentences.english: Pipes allow you to redirect output from one command into another.
sentences.chinese: 管道允許您將一個命令的輸出重定向到另一個命令。

sentences.english: The user is then authenticated and redirected to the requested page.
sentences.chinese: 然後，驗證用戶身份並將其重定向到請求頁。

sentences.english: A redirected restore is the only way to accomplish this.
sentences.chinese: 這樣做的惟一辦法是使用重定向恢復。

sentences.english: Application writes are transparently redirected to this temporary local file.
sentences.chinese: 應用的寫被透明地重定向到這個臨時文件。

sentences.english: This is the engine that handles the redirects.
sentences.chinese: 這就是處理重定向的引擎。

sentences.english: Below are examples of bad redirects.
sentences.chinese: 以下是不利於搜索引擎的重定向示例。

sentences.english: Choosing redirect will put your database in restore pending state.
sentences.chinese: 選擇重定向會將您的數據庫置於恢復掛起狀態。
